description:
Silas showed up all shaved up...grrrr...apparently a special friend had requested it. But the good news is, Vance's body hair is finally back in full force. He's looking like the naturally hot masculine dude.
I dunno..the two of them look pretty amazing together. Silas's skin is porcelain flawless (well, other than a burn on his calf from his motorcycle) and Vance is looking all mature. It's not exactly Daddy and Son, but the opposites do look right together.
Silas has been watching all kinds of nutty things online, and he thought he could try a pretty big dildo if we eased him up to it. Vance was surprisingly eager to shove giant things up Silas's ass. I think we released his inner top pig in him!
I think this video has some of the best full insert coverage of any video I have done. They are both polished performers and know how let me get in there so we can all see the naughtiness that is going on.
Cum shot is pretty hot as Silas takes it to the face while he simultaneously makes his dick glop!
title: Silas & Vance - Wrapped
